column2: You are a member of the Free Peoples of Middle-Earth, and must work with others to hold the Shadow at bay.
column3: Vous êtes un membres des Peuples Libres de la Terre du Milieu, et vous tentez de banir Sauron hors de ce monde.

column2: Elves are leaving, and there is no strength left in men. Perhaps, it would be wise to ... join the winning side and serve Sauron willingly?
column3: Elves are leaving, and there is no strength left in men. Perhaps, it would be wise to ... join the winning side and serve Sauron willingly?

column2: Your liege-lord has submitted to Sauron! Do you declare independence, or keep to your oaths?
column3: Your liege-lord has submitted to Sauron! Do you declare independence, or keep to your oaths?

column2: I will not serve this traitor!
column3: I will not serve this traitor!

column2: Ally with Sauron? Your will has turned to madness, and you are faithless and accursed! I declare my bond to you broken.
column3: Ally with Sauron? Your will has turned to madness, and you are faithless and accursed! I declare my bond to you broken.

column2: I'll see you dead for this!
column3: I'll see you dead for this!

column2: None can withstand the will of Sauron.
column3: None can withstand the will of Sauron.

column2: Your liege-lord has submitted to Sauron! Do you leave his court, or follow him into darkness?
column3: Your liege-lord has submitted to Sauron! Do you leave his court, or follow him into darkness?

column2: I will not serve this traitor!
column3: I will not serve this traitor!

column2: It is not my place to question you, my Liege. You lead, and I follow.
column3: It is not my place to question you, my Liege. You lead, and I follow.

column2: You are mad, we cannot submit to Sauron!
column3: You are mad, we cannot submit to Sauron!

column2: Then leave, while you still can...
column3: Then leave, while you still can...

column2: Treating with Sauron seems like madness, but if this is what it takes to ensure the survival of our people...
column3: Treating with Sauron seems like madness, but if this is what it takes to ensure the survival of our people...

column2: It has come to your attention that there is at least one among your vassals and courtiers who proclaims not just acceptance, but Allegiance to evil.
An emissary from the Dark Lord appears - he demands your allegiance and aid in his wars. "Accept, and you shall have the friendship of Mordor. Reject, and you shall suffer the wrath of a God!"
column3: Un émissaire de Sauron se présente devant vous. Il réclame votre allégeance et votre aide dans les guerres à venir. "Acceptez, et vous aurez l'amitié du Mordor. Rejetez, et souffrez la colère de mon Seigneur et Maitre!".

column2: None can withstand the will of Sauron!
column3: Personne ne peut résister à la Volonté de Sauron!

column2: My people are not slaves of Mordor!
column3: Mon Peuple n'est pas esclave du Mordor!

column2: Perhaps you were wrong, perhaps Sauron is not a God. Maybe your people deserve hope, and not fear. If you dare, you could forsake the darkness, and try to help the enemies of the Dark Lord.
column3: Perhaps you were wrong, perhaps Sauron is not a God. Maybe your people deserve hope, and not fear. If you dare, you could forsake the darkness, and try to help the enemies of the Dark Lord.

column2: As a creature of Melkor's making, you are corrupted by Darkness and work with other evil rulers to defeat those who stand in your way.
column3: As a creature of Melkor's making, you are corrupted by Darkness and work with other evil rulers to defeat those who stand in your way.

column2: It has come to your attention that there is at least one among your vassals and courtiers who proclaims not just acceptance, but Allegiance to the Valar and other enemies of Melkor.
Surrender to the Power of Evil
The Forces of Evil are getting stronger. Their power is growing. You are a wise person and a provident ruler, you may have to take a heavy decision for sake and salvation of your people: Surrender.
column3: Les Forces de Sauron sont de plus en plus puissantes, et vous êtes une personnage sage, et un dirigeant avisé. Vous avez le pouvoir de protéger votre Peuple… Vous vous agenouiller devant le pouvoir de Sauron.

column2: Anger, blood and death all around us... Our people are slaves of the Dark Forces and suffer countless pains because of the wars which we are involved in. Let us break the chains that keep us tied, let us become a Free People and fight for the peace and freedom of Middle-earth!
column3: Colère, Sang et Mort sont sur nous ! Notre Peuple a trop longtemps été l'esclave du Seigneur Noir, et nous avons trop souffert des guerres dans lesquelles nous avons été embarquées. Il est temps de se libérer. Brisons nos chaines, et rejoignons les Peuples Libres dans leur combat contre Sauron !
Ce personnage a rejeté les Ténèbres, et est fait de nouveau partie des Peuples Libres.
Ce personnage s'est laissé séduire par Sauron, et a rejoins ses légions en vue de sa Grande Guerre.
